dataqual.logic: Availability of suitable imagery required that imagery captured at different times between 1985 and 1987 were used.
dataqual.complete: Thematic Mapper imagery was gathered from a three year span of flights to ensure complete coverage of the state of Pennsylvania.

pubinfo.publish: Penn State University, Dept. of Meteorology

srcinfo.srccontr: Fractional vegetation for estimation of vegetation
